ygData.subject: RE: switching instrument/ranger slot (Was RE: Skill Caps)
ygData.msgSnippet: The problem with the range slot is that it is there for any bards that want to use it (throwing knives, shuriken, daggers, Mino Axes!!)...why any bard would
ygData.messageBody:
The problem with the range slot is that it is there for any bards that want
to use it (throwing knives, shuriken, daggers, Mino Axes!!)...why any bard
would want to use it - got me. But it's there and it will not be changed.
Doubt Verant will go to the trouble of altering the interface to include a
slot just for us bards. Would be nice though. Personally, I use my range
slot to hold a Runed Bone Fork, and I am perfectly happy with it there as it
is literally about as good as a fork (Spork?) for melee purposes.

> > From: silky@...
> >
> >
> > Well, if ya send another letter, PLEASE ask them to add a
> > instrument slot
> > for us - much like folks using a bow - there is ALREADY a way for the
> > client to switch them out without having to manually juggle.
> >
> > Folks with weapons don't disarm to use a bow - casters don't
> > have to disarm
> > to cast - why do WE have to disarm to go to an instrument?
